SmartFieldSpec.Name: Number Of Active Correspondent Child Sponsorships Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Count of active child sponsorship correspondent commitments for this Constituent (sponsorships - not gifted).
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_NUMBEROFACTIVECORRESPONDENTCHILDSPONSORSHIPSFORCONSTITUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date select c.ID, count (so_child.id) from dbo.CONSTITUENT c left join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s ON s.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID and s.STATUSCODE = 1 left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so_child.ID group by c.ID
